column1: Regular traffic reports will resume Wednesday February 10 at 4:00 p.m.

column4: Old Frankfort Pike between Redd Rd and S Yarnallton Pike
column5: Roadway shutdown due to a damaged gas line as a result of an earlier collision.  Detour in place.

column4: Currently in effect and until Thursday February 11 at 7:00 p.m.
